solution_line_template: Start with the consumed oranges: {initial_oranges} oranges - {eaten_oranges} oranges = <<{initial_oranges}-{eaten_oranges}={oranges_after_eating}>>{oranges_after_eating} oranges.
To find the stolen oranges: {oranges_after_eating} oranges /{stolen_divisor} = <<{oranges_after_eating}/{stolen_divisor}={stolen_oranges}>>{stolen_oranges} oranges.
To find the number of oranges after the return: {stolen_oranges} oranges + {returned_oranges} oranges = <<{stolen_oranges}+{returned_oranges}={final_oranges}>>{final_oranges} oranges.
